text: With a ram you are to prepare a grain offering of two-tenths of an ephah 15:6 Two-tenths of an ephah is approximately 4 dry quarts or 4.4 liters (probably about 5.1 pounds or 2.3 kilograms of flour). of fine flour mixed with a third of a hin of olive oil,15:6 Or a third of a hin of oil; that is, approximately 1.3 quarts or 1.2 liters; similarly in verse 7
